name: Chauncy
description:
One of the first games we made together, just a few months before going full-time into Butterscotch.

Chauncy the Rabbit is a game about luck. Each run you navigate through a wasteland of good and bad luck charms. Colliding with the charms adds or subtracts luck from your overall pool. At the end of the run, you're judged by the God of Luck, Kismet, who has slot machine teeth.

It's pretty whack, and way out of balance. But hey, you gotta start somewhere!

Developed in June 2012.
